cleaning_steps.reason: JIRA has 15 columns that need mapping to our 16-column unified schema
GitHub uses labels instead of priority and state instead of status
Excel data has informal column names and free-text fields
Duplicates from same source with same ticket_id and title are redundant

cleaning_steps.details: Mapped to Critical/High/Medium/Low. 0 unmapped values set to Unknown
cleaning_steps.reason: 18 different priority representations consolidated to 4 standard levels
20+ status variations consolidated to 4 standard statuses
Multiple naming conventions consolidated for cross-source analysis
15 environment variations consolidated to 4 standard names
SDLC classification enables phase-based defect analysis

cleaning_steps.details: Valid created dates: 3584, Valid resolved dates: 1762
cleaning_steps.reason: Multiple date formats unified to datetime for time-series analysis

cleaning_steps.details: Converted text values to minutes, removed invalid entries
cleaning_steps.reason: Negative and zero values indicate logging errors, text values converted to numeric
UNKNOWN, empty strings, and None replaced with Unknown for consistency

cleaning_steps.details: Unified browser and OS naming conventions
cleaning_steps.reason: Inconsistent casing and abbreviations prevented accurate platform analysis
Bug type classification enables pattern analysis across crash vs UI vs performance issues
